ygData.subject: Re: Anyone else remember this?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The reference was actually to a song that he thought we would like, and he was anxious to see how we would adapt to it.  I think he was referring to Niv s
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:48 PM 2/28/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Greg Gillan <ggillan@...>
>
>I remember reading a while back (I think), not sure if it was here or
>somewhere else a hint from GZ that we might be getting a new charm type song
>for one of our missing high level song slots.
>Does anyone else remember reading this? If so, could you repost? I can't
>find it anywhere.


The reference was actually to a song that he thought we would like, and he
was anxious to see how we would adapt to it. I think he was referring to
Niv's Melody of Preservation.

Talies the Wanderer
